column3: Search by product (HS code) - Trade Data Online

column6: title="Trade Data Online" target="_blank">Trade Data Online

column7: Begin by making your selection in the options below. To view the data press the Run report button.

column9: title="Trader is the country that records imported goods coming in or exported goods leaving through customs.">Trader

column10: Source: US Census Bureau - data not comparable to Statistics Canada's due to different methodologies - see FAQ

column9: <option value="specific">Find country, region, or US state</option>

column3: Enter keywords or HS codes for the product you are interested in.

column4: Only one product per report is permitted for the top 10 countries option.
Select a product category and press the View Products button to view all products for that category.
Only one industry per report is permitted for the top 10 countries option.

column1: Select one or more products and press the Add to Selected Products button.
You must select at least one code.
<select name="searchCodes" size="20" id="searchCodes" multiple="multiple" class="form-control mrgn-lft-md"
<input id="addSelectedCodesButton" class="btn btn-primary" value="Add to selected products" type="button">
